posts.post_content:
T206 HOF Sale:

Free S/H, any form of payment.

email preferred over PMs:  [url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

My scanner and SGC holders don't get along.:confused:  I can try to send better scans if desired.  Also, below prices are not set in stone.:cool:



**** EDIT ****

ONLY Marquard is available via BST.  I forgot I have Brown and Collins up on ebay.
Marquard (Follow Trough - Tolstoi) -- SGC 20/fair/1.5 -- $110
Slight wet-image transfer on front, ink on back.
